author: nick
msg: Don't swap AreaPtg references from relative to absolute, by correctly processing the fields. Patch from bug #44293

author: ferdinand
msg: changed font-familily and removed boldness from all box-headings (warning, fixme, note) for better readability´.

author: ferdinand
msg: Minor changes to typesetting of headings (font changed to sans-serif) and padding of box.

author: ferdinand
msg: Adjustements to imagehandling for fop94: Added content-width and content-height=scale-to-fit so that image fills available space of surrounding box. Added a hack for lacking support for scale-down-to-fit in fop094. Because of some shortcomings in fop94, images that are high and narrow may overflow the page, moved one page up and clipped to page height and scaling with %heights will not work.

author: vhennebert
msg: Fixed a bug in computeContentLength when there are empty cells
